==========
Word Neo4j
==========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/word_neo4j.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/word_neo4j

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/kruegg21/word_neo4j.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/kruegg21/word_neo4j

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/word-neo4j/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://word-neo4j.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Word Neo4j contains modules relating to word components of Neo4j Cypher queries'


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://word-neo4j.readthedocs.io.
